name: Mush (itch)
description:
Jump on peoples head and just survive as long as you can. Keep going up or you'll fall behind.

Keyboard/Controller(PS4 layout) Controls:

AD/Left stick - Move

Space/X - Jump

Shift/O - To plant bomb on a platform

Q or Alt+F4 - Quit game

R - Restart level

Background music from PlayOnLoop.com

Sound effects from Zapsplat.com

Made by Eddie Chapman, Sam Huang and Tracy Lin
